T02D1795:5a-7: chen po dang / rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rjes su 'brangs nas gleng gzhi bshad par bya ste /
T02D1795:5a-8: de la re zhig phyi rol gyi bshad pa'i phyogs
T02D1795:5a-9: su 'di skad ces bya bas rgyud ma lus pa'i
T02D1795:5a-10: don ston par byed pa'i tshig gi phrad kyis sdud
T02D1795:5a-11: pa po'i brjod par 'dod pa la snang brgyud kyi
T02D1795:5a-13: de ltar na 'di skad ces bya ba ni ji
T02D1795:5a-14: ltar sdud par gyur ba de lta bu nyid du
T02D1795:5a-15: ste / sgro 'dogs pa dang skur pa 'debs pa
T02D1795:5a-16: dag gis ni ma yin zhes bya ba'i don to
T02D1795:5a-17: ste / // bdag gis zhes bya ba ni bdag
T02D1795:5a-18: nyid gtso bor gyur pa'i 'khor de bzhin gshegs pa
T02D1795:5a-19: ste / // dang / lhan cig spyod ma dang /
T02D1795:5a-23: de ltar ji ltar 'og nas 'chad par 'gyur ba
T02D1795:5a-24: de'i phyir bdag nyid gtso bor gyur pa'i 'khor gyis
T02D1795:5a-25: so // thos pa zhes bya ba ni rtogs pa ni ma yin no //
T02D1795:5a-26: rang nyid kyis mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i
T02D1795:5a-27: chos bstan pa yin gyi ston pa po las thos
T02D1795:5a-28: pa sdud pa pos sdud par byed de /
T02D1795:5a-29: de bas na thos pa zhes bya ba 'dis 'og nas sdud pa po mtshon par byed do //
T02D1795:5a-30: dngos su ma yin pa thos pa'am gzhan du thos
T02D1795:5a-31: pa la sdud pa po tshad ma nyid du 'gyur
T02D1795:5a-32: ro // de'i phyir bdag gis dngos su thos pa
T02D1795:5a-33: zhes brjod pa la bdag gi bla ma dang de'i
T02D1795:5a-34: bla ma rnams las ni ma yin no zhes ston
T02D1795:5a-35: ro // par 'gyur ro // gang gi zhe na /
T02D1795:5a-36: de'i phyir dus gcig na zhes gsungs te /
T02D1795:5a-37: dus gcig ni dus gcig gi tshe na 'di thos
T02D1795:5a-38: la gzhan du ni gzhan dag thos pa'o zhes bya
T02D1795:5a-39: ba 'di sdud pa po mang du thos pa nyid
T02D1795:5a-40: du bstan to // yang dus gcig gi tshe zhes
T02D1795:5a-41: bya ba ni dus gcig la ste dus gzhan du
T02D1795:5a-42: 'di lta bu bstan pa med pa'i phyir /
T02D1795:5a-43: des na rgyud rnyed par dka' ba nyid gsungs so //
T02D1795:5a-44: yang na dus gcig gi tshe 'di thos pa ste /
T02D1795:5a-45: gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi padma
T02D1795:5a-46: las rgyud bstan pa'i ngag thos pa de nyid kyi
T02D1795:5a-47: tshe skad cig gcig nyid la bdag gis lhag chad
T02D1795:5b-0: med par @5b bzung zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1795:5b-1: 'dis ni spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa nyid sdud pa po la bstan to //
T02D1795:5b-3: de'i phyir bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba gsungs so //
T02D1795:5b-4: gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das gnas khyad par can du bzhugs pa /
T02D1795:5b-5: de'i tshe drung nas thos zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02D1795:5b-6: de la bdud bzhi bcom pa'am dbang phyug la sogs
T02D1795:5b-7: pa'i yon tan drug dang ldan pas na bcom ldan
T02D1795:5b-8: 'das so // de stong pa nyid bsgoms pas 'chi bdag gi bdud bcom mo //
T02D1795:5b-9: lha sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi bdag nyid can gyi
T02D1795:5b-10: dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i rnam pa rang gi lus
T02D1795:5b-11: la yongs su shes pas phung po'i bdud bcom mo
T02D1795:5b-12: // de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i rnam pas nyon mongs
T02D1795:5b-13: pa lnga yongs su shes pas nyon mongs pa'i bdud
T02D1795:5b-14: // bcom mo // bgegs bskrad pa'i dus na dbang
T02D1795:5b-15: po la sogs pa'i phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten skyong ba
T02D1795:5b-16: la phur bus btab pas rnam par bcom pa'i phyir
T02D1795:5b-18: de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das la dbang phyug tshang ba ste /
T02D1795:5b-19: bag chags dang bcas pa'i nyon mongs pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa thams cad spangs pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1795:5b-20: de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das la ye shes kyang tshang ba ste /
T02D1795:5b-21: bdag med pa nyid kyi rnam pas chos thams cad yongs su shes pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1795:5b-23: sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sgo nas thams cad du grags pa'i sgra rnyed pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1795:5b-24: dpal tshang ba ste rnam pa thams cad du sems
T02D1795:5b-25: can thams cad kyi don du gnyer ba'i phyir ro
T02D1795:5b-26: // gzugs tshang ba ste mtshungs pa med pa'i mtshan
T02D1795:5b-27: dang dpe byad rnams kyis yan lag rnam par mdzes
T02D1795:5b-28: // pa'i phyir ro // 'bad pa tshang ba ste
T02D1795:5b-29: sems can gcig gi ched du yang 'khor ba'i mthar
T02D1795:5b-30: thug pa med par gnas pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1795:5b-32: de'i phyir bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams
T02D1795:5b-33: cad kyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te
T02D1795:5b-34: / de bzhin nyid du gshegs pa dang /
T02D1795:5b-35: 'khor ba las ji ltar gshegs par bde pa de
T02D1795:5b-36: lta bu nyid du mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las
T02D1795:5b-37: 'das pa nyid du gshegs pa dang /
T02D1795:5b-38: dngos po 'ga' zhig ji ltar song ba de lta bu nyid du 'gyur bas na /
T02D1795:5b-39: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams so //
T02D1795:6a-1: thams cad khyab par byed pas na thams cad do //
T02D1795:6a-2: thams cad kyang yin la de bzhin gshegs pa yang
T02D1795:6a-3: yin pas na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad de
T02D1795:6a-4: / bsdu na rigs lnga dang 'brel ba rnams so //
T02D1795:6a-5: de rnams kyi sku gsung thugs ni rin chen 'byung ldan dang /
T02D1795:6a-6: don yod grub pa dag ji ltar rigs par rnam
T02D1795:6a-7: par snang mdzad dang snang ba mtha' yas dag la
T02D1795:6a-8: 'dus pa'i phyir gsang ba gsum gyi rang bzhin rnams
T02D1795:6a-9: te thams cad 'dus pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1795:6a-10: de rnams kyi snying po'i ngo bo rdo rje btsun
T02D1795:6a-11: mo rnams ni spyan ma la sogs pa rnams so
T02D1795:6a-12: // de rnams kyi bha ga ni chos 'byung gi phyag rgya'i rang bzhin rnams so //
T02D1795:6a-13: de la bzhugs te zhes bya ba ni de la
T02D1795:6a-14: gnas pa'i gzhal yas khang na bzhugs par gyur pa'o
T02D1795:6a-15: // 'di skad ston par 'gyur te stong pa nyid
T02D1795:6a-16: bsgoms pa'i rjes la rdo rje 'chang chen po yongs
T02D1795:6a-17: su gyur pa las skyes pa'i chos 'byung gi phyag
T02D1795:6a-18: rgya'i steng du yam ram bam lam gi sa bon
T02D1795:6a-19: yongs su gyur pa las skyes pa don yod grub
T02D1795:6a-20: pa ngag gi dbang phyug dang thugs kyi dbang phyug
T02D1795:6a-21: dang rin chen 'byung ldan rig ma dang bcas pa
T02D1795:6a-22: yongs su gyur pa las rlung dang me dang chu
T02D1795:6a-23: dang sa'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du rnam par snang
T02D1795:6a-24: mdzad yongs su gyur pa las skyes pa'i gzhal yas
T02D1795:6a-25: khang gi steng du nyi ma dang zla ba la
T02D1795:6a-26: sogs pa'i gdan gi [*gyi] steng du gang gi tshe
T02D1795:6a-27: ba bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa de'i tshe bdag gis
T02D1795:6a-28: thos so zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1795:6a-29: bzhugs so zhes bya ba ni rdzu 'phrul gyi gnas pa bzhis bzhugs pa'o //
T02D1795:6a-30: de la rdzu 'phrul gyi gnas pa bzhi ni gang zhe na /
T02D1795:6a-32: spyod lam gyi gnas pa dang /
T02D1795:6a-33: snyoms par 'jug pa'i gnas pa dang /
T02D1795:6a-34: nang du yang dag 'jog gi gnas pa zhes bya'o //
T02D1795:6a-35: de la gang zhig bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung gi las thams cad ni ston pa'i gnas pa'o //
T02D1795:6a-36: gang zhig sku'i phrin las thams cad ni spyod lam gyi gnas pa'o //
T02D1795:6a-37: gang zhig bsam gtan dang ting nge 'dzin la snyoms
T02D1795:6a-38: par 'jug pa la yid kyi las thams cad rang
T02D1795:6a-39: bzhin gyis mnyam par gzhag pa ste //
T02D1795:6a-40: de rnams kyi snyoms par 'jug pa'i gnas pa'o //
T02D1795:6a-41: gang zhig lha la sogs pa'i nye bar 'gro ba
T02D1795:6a-42: la sogs pa rnams la rang bzhin gyis rnam par
T02D1795:6a-43: dag pa'i yid kyi las de nang du yang dag
T02D1795:6b-2: nang du ae zhes bya ba ni shes rab dang /
T02D1795:6b-8: de'i rtsa ba dang de'i rig pa'o //
T02D1795:6b-9: thig les ni de dang yang dag par sbyor bas
T02D1795:6b-10: thig le'i ngo bo bde ba chen po nyams su
T02D1795:6b-11: myong ba'o // 'dis kyang don dam pa'i bde ba
T02D1795:6b-12: chen po nyams su myong ba sngon du 'gro bas
T02D1795:6b-14: bdag gis zhes bya ba 'dis ni aa ham gi
T02D1795:6b-15: ngo bos rgyud dang ye shes kyi rim pa'i ngo
T02D1795:6b-16: bo nyid kyis thig le bzhi'i ngo bos 'khor lo
T02D1795:6b-17: bzhi la longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku mtshon pa'o//
T02D1795:6b-18: thos pa zhes bya ba 'dis ni 'dzag pa'i don gyis sprul pa'i sku mtshon to //
T02D1795:6b-20: gcig ni nam mkha' dang 'dra ste //
T02D1795:6b-21: gzhan ni zla ba rdzogs pa 'dra //
T02D1795:6b-23: skyob pa rnams kyi chos sku de //
T02D1795:6b-24: gang zhig zla ba rdzogs pa ltar //
T02D1795:6b-25: de nyid longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku mtshon pa'o //
T02D1795:6b-26: dus gcig na zhes bya ba 'di ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dus gsungs so //
T02D1795:6b-28: bzang ba'i dus dang ngan pa'i dus //
T02D1795:6b-29: bsam gyis mi khyab dus nyid dang //
T02D1795:6b-30: sna yi bu ga gnyis nas ni //
T02D1795:6b-31: 'ongs pa bzang po'i dus zhes brjod //
T02D1795:6b-32: song ba dus ngan zhes brjod do //
T02D1795:6b-33: bsam gyis mi khyab de bzhin 'gyur //
T02D1795:6b-34: srog dang rtsol ba rnam spangs pa //
T02D1795:6b-37: dus gcig ces ni brjod pa min //
T02D1795:6b-39: bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba 'dis ni dga' ba
T02D1795:6b-40: gsum 'joms par byed pa'i lhan cig skyes pa brjod
T02D1795:6b-41: pa yin no // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
T02D1795:6b-42: ni rtsa stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis sdud par
T02D1795:6b-43: byed pa'i 'khor lo bzhi'am drug rnams te /
T02D1795:6b-44: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1795:6b-45: de rnams kyi sku gsung thugs ni de sdud par byed pa'i rnam pa can rtsa gsum mo //
T02D1795:6b-46: de nyid ni snying po ste rtsa gsum po de'i dbang gis rtsa gzhan rnams bskyed pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1795:6b-47: de'i ngo bo'i rdo rje btsun mo rnams ni las
T02D1795:6b-48: dang dam tshig dang ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i ngo
T02D1795:6b-49: bo rnams so // de rnams kyi bha ga rnams
T02D1795:6b-50: ni kun rdzob tu chos 'byung gi lte ba'i gnas
T02D1795:7a-1: gi tshe thig le'i ngo bos gnas pa mdzad pa
T02D1795:7a-2: de'i tshe bdag gis thos zhes bya ba'i tha tshig
T02D1795:7a-4: de ltar gleng gzhi bshad nas 'khor phun sum tshogs pa rgyas par bshad par bstan par 'dod nas //
T02D1795:7a-5: tshad med pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te ;
T02D1795:7a-6: 'di tsam nyid du gzhal bar mi nus pa nyid kyi phyir tshad med pa'o //
T02D1795:7a-7: phyag rgya chen po zhes bya ba ni dga' ba
T02D1795:7a-8: chen po len pas na phyag rgya chen po ste
T02D1795:7a-9: / shin tu zab pa ma yin pa dang shin
T02D1795:7a-10: tu zab pa'i rim pas rdzogs pa'i skur brjod do
T02D1795:7a-11: / // de'i don du mngon par rdzogs pa spros
T02D1795:7a-12: pa'i rgyud rdo rje dang zla ba la sogs pa'i
T02D1795:7a-13: rim pa dang rigs brgya'i dbye ba bsgom pa gang
T02D1795:7a-14: zhig mngon par rtogs pa de la bzhugs pa ni
T02D1795:7a-15: gnas pa gang rnams la yod pa de ni de
T02D1795:7a-16: / // ltar ro // dpag tu med pa rdo rje'i rigs dang /
T02D1795:7a-17: rab tu 'brel ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sngags kyi sgo nas spyad pa spyod pa ste /
T02D1795:7a-18: byang chub ni sku gsum gyi rnam pa can la
T02D1795:7a-19: sems dpa' ni dgongs pa gang la yod pa de
T02D1795:7a-21: de rnams kyi bye ba ni 'bum phrag bcu'i rnam pa'o //
T02D1795:7a-22: de rnams kyi khrag khrig ni sa ya'i rnam pa'o //
T02D1795:7a-23: de'i grangs brgya stong ni 'bum mo //
T02D1795:7a-24: de'i grangs kyis ni rnam par bcad pa dang lhan cig tu zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02D1795:7a-26: de'i phyir thams cad kyang zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02D1795:7a-27: phyag rgya chen po'i mngon par rtogs par zhes bya ba la /
T02D1795:7a-28: phyag rgya chen po ni ngag 'od gsal ba'i rang
T02D1795:7a-29: bzhin rnam pa med pa sngar bshad pa'i tshig nyid
T02D1795:7a-30: kyis so // de'i phyir mngon par rtogs pa ni thob par byed pa'i thabs te /
T02D1795:7a-31: rgyas par ni brgya rtsa brgyad kyis rlung gi grangs
T02D1795:7a-32: can dang bsdu na yang rlung bcu'i rnam pa'i grangs
T02D1795:7a-33: nye bar mtshon pa sngon du 'gro bas 'jug pa
T02D1795:7a-34: la sogs pa gsum gyi grangs kyis nyi khri chig
T02D1795:7a-35: stong drug brgya'i dbugs kyi ngo bo'o //
T02D1795:7a-36: de la gnas par 'gro ba gang rnams la yod pa de ni mngon du byed pa ste /
T02D1795:7a-37: bsgom pa rab kyi mthar thug par 'gro ba'o //
T02D1795:7a-38: de la gnas pa ni de mngon du byed pa la bzhugs pa'o //
T02D1795:7a-39: 'dis ni rdo rje bzlas pa mngon du bye ba'i byang chub sems dpa' la bstan to //
T02D1795:7a-40: gzhan yang ji lta bu rnams kyis shes na /
T02D1795:7a-41: de'i phyir gnyis su med pa'i bde ba chen po zhes gsungs te /
T02D1795:7b-0: gnyis med ni gzung 'dzin dang @7b rnam par bral
T02D1795:7b-1: bar sems can thams cad la khyab pa bde ba
T02D1795:7b-2: chen po sems 'od gsal ba'i rnam pa de'i nyams
T02D1795:7b-4: snang ba la sogs pa ye shes gsum gyi sgo
T02D1795:7b-5: nas rig pa des dgyes pa ni khyad par can
T02D1795:7b-6: gyi bde ba'o // des khab byed pa ni rab tu rgyas pa'o //
T02D1795:7b-7: mchog ni khyad par 'phags pa'i ngo bo ste /
T02D1795:7b-8: zhal gyi padma ni gang gis de rnams de bzhin du'o //
T02D1795:7b-9: 'dis ni sems rnam par dben pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyis bya ba'i tha tshig go /
T02D1795:7b-10: de bzhin du chos thams cad ces bya ba la
T02D1795:7b-11: sogs pas de chos rnams thams cad ni phung po
T02D1795:7b-12: la sogs pa rnams sgyu ma'i dpe bcu gnyis kyi
T02D1795:7b-13: ji lta ba bzhin ni sgyu ma'i dpe bcu gnyis
T02D1795:7b-14: kyi rnam pa nyams su myong ba ni ye shes
T02D1795:7b-15: te / de mthong ba ni mngon du byed pa'i
T02D1795:7b-16: phyir bdag byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa'i pha rol
T02D1795:7b-17: tu phyin pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1795:7b-18: gzhan yang rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes kyi zhes bya ba la /
T02D1795:7b-19: rnam par mi rtog pa ni phyag rgya dang ting
T02D1795:7b-20: nge 'dzin gyi rim pa dag gis rang bzhin gyis
T02D1795:7b-21: 'od gsal ba'i ye shes ni thams cad stong pa'i
T02D1795:7b-23: de bzhin ni de kho na nyid de bag chags
T02D1795:7b-24: su gyur pa'i rang bzhin gyi tshogs spong ba'i ngo
T02D1795:7b-25: bo nyid kyi phyir phyin ci ma log pa'o //
T02D1795:7b-26: de la mngon du phyogs pa ni mngon du phyogs
T02D1795:7b-27: pa'i 'gyur ba rnams kyis zhes bya ba'i don to
T02D1795:7b-28: // 'dis ni mngon par byang chub pa'i rim pa
T02D1795:7b-29: mthar phyin pa nyid du 'di rnams kyis bstan to
T02D1795:7b-30: // // de bzhin du bla na med pa zhes
T02D1795:7b-31: bya ba la sogs pa la bla na med pa'i
T02D1795:7b-32: rdo rje 'chang chen po ni zung 'jug gi rnam
T02D1795:7b-33: // // pa / don dam pa de mi slob pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1795:7b-34: de'i dam tshig ni slob pa dang mi slob pa'i
T02D1795:7b-35: ngo bo zung 'jug mngon du byed pa'i thabs te
T02D1795:7b-36: / de las mi 'da' ba'i phyir ro //
T02D1795:7b-37: des dbang du gyur pa ni rang dbang can te /
T02D1795:7b-38: bdag byin gyis brlab pa dang mngon par byang chub
T02D1795:7b-39: pa'i rim pa gnyis tha mi dad pa'i ngo bo
T02D1795:7b-40: de la rab tu mkhas pa /
T02D1795:7b-41: de mngon du byed pa rnams kyis zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02D1795:7b-42: 'dis ni zung du 'jug pa'i rim pa mthar phyin pa nyid bstan to //
T02D1795:7b-43: de ltar 'khor phun sum tshogs pa mdor bstan par mdzad nas /
T02D1795:7b-44: de'i rgyas par bshad pa'i yan lag gtso bo bstan
T02D1795:7b-45: par 'dod nas ji tsam gyis dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor
T02D1795:7b-46: lo yongs su rdzogs pa de tsam gyi grangs dang
T02D1795:8a-0: @8a * // ldan pa'i 'khor gyi tshogs 'di lta ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1795:8a-1: 'dis ni mngon sum gyis yongs su bgrang ba ston par byed de /
T02D1795:8a-2: dam tshig rdo rje dang zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1795:8a-3: las thams cad pa nyid kyis dam tshig thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid kyi phyir dang /
T02D1795:8a-4: dam tshig nyams pa rnams la de'i rnal 'byor gyis slar dam tshig ster ba'i phyir dang /
T02D1795:8a-5: 'du byed kyi phung po rnam par dag par bsgrubs
T02D1795:8a-6: pas 'da' bar mi bya ba nyid kyi phyir dam
T02D1795:8a-7: tshig rdo rje ni don yod grub pa ste des
T02D1795:8a-8: so // byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba ni
T02D1795:8a-9: byang chub ni sku gsum gyi ngo bo nyid de
T02D1795:8a-10: chos thams cad ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs pa'i
T02D1795:8a-11: so // phyir ro // de la sems dpa' ni

T02D1795:17a-24: rdo rje phreng ba mngon par byang chub pa //
T02D1795:17a-25: zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas zhes bya ba ni sngar bshad zin to //
T02D1795:17a-26: gzhan ci zhig byas nas she na /
T02D1795:17a-28: gsang ba'i rdo rje las zhes gsungs te /
T02D1795:17a-29: rang nyid kyi thabs kyi rdo rje gsang ba'i sbubs su nub pa las so //
T02D1795:17a-30: bcom ldan 'das kyis zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1795:17a-31: rnam par rtog pa 'joms par byed pa'o //
T02D1795:17a-32: rang gi rig ma zhes bya ba ni rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma'o //
T02D1795:17a-33: phyung ste zhes bya ba ni zhal gsum phyag drug pa'i ngo bos spros nas so //
T02D1795:17a-35: de'i phyir sgeg pa la sogs pa'i nyams dang ldan pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1795:17a-36: de la bcom ldan 'das dang lhan cig tu snyoms
T02D1795:17a-37: par 'jug par gnas pas sgeg pa'i nyams dang ldan
T02D1795:17a-38: pa'o // rnam par rtog pa las mi 'jigs pa nyid kyis dpa' ba dang ldan pa'o //
T02D1795:17b-0: bdud rtsi'i ro myang ba nyid kyis @17b rngam pa dang ldan pa'o //
T02D1795:17b-1: drag po'i mtshon cha 'dzin pa nyid kyis drag po dang ldan pa'o //
T02D1795:17b-2: nye bar zhi ba'i bzhad pa'i rnam pa nyid kyi phyir bzhad pa dang ldan pa'o //
T02D1795:17b-3: bgegs la sogs pa bzlog pa dang bka'i 'khor lo
T02D1795:17b-4: spro ba la yan lag gi dngos po 'gro ba'i
T02D1795:17b-5: phyir 'jigs su rung dang ldan pa'o ;
T02D1795:17b-6: / rang bzhin gyis thugs rje chen po'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir snying rje ba dang ldan pa'o //
T02D1795:17b-7: dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo sar pa sar pa sprul
T02D1795:17b-8: pa la rgyur gyur pa'i phyir ngo mtshar ba dang
T02D1795:17b-9: ldan pa'o // don dam par rnam pa med pa nyid kyi phyir zhi ba'i nyams dang ldan pa'o //
T02D1795:17b-10: gzhan yang ci zhig byas nas she na ;
T02D1795:17b-11: de phyir bdag nyid kyis 'dod chags dang bral ba'i gzugs spangs nas zhes gsungs te /
T02D1795:17b-12: bdag nyid kyis zhes bya ba ni rang gis so //
T02D1795:17b-13: 'dod chags dang bral ba'i gzugs zhes bya ba ni sh'akya thub pa'i cha byad do //
T02D1795:17b-14: spangs nas zhes bya ba ni mi snang bar byas nas so //
T02D1795:17b-15: sgeg pa la sogs pa'i nyams dang ldan pa'i gzugs
T02D1795:17b-16: bzung nas zhes bya ba ni de ma thag tu
T02D1795:17b-17: bshad zin to // bcom ldan 'das ji lta bu zhe na /
T02D1795:17b-19: rang gi rig ma la 'khyud nas //
T02D1795:17b-21: 'dod pa'i khams na gnas pa'i sems can rnams kyi
T02D1795:17b-22: ched du bcom ldan 'das ma rdo rje dbyings kyi
T02D1795:17b-23: dbang phyug ma dang lhan cig gnyis su med pa'i
T02D1795:17b-24: sbyor ba rjes su thob pa'o //
T02D1795:17b-25: de ltar 'khor rnams kyi dgongs pa yongs su shes
T02D1795:17b-26: pa sngon du 'gro bas 'dod pa'i dbang phyug bstan
T02D1795:17b-27: par mdzad nas / da ni 'khor rnams la ngo mtshar bskyed pa bstan pa brjod pa'i phyir /
T02D1795:17b-28: slar yang de rnams kyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1795:17b-29: sngar bstan pa'i cho 'phrul la ltos pas so //
T02D1795:17b-30: de rnams kyis zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1795:17b-31: 'khor na gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis so //
T02D1795:17b-32: de lta bu'i zhes bya ba ni 'dod chags dang
T02D1795:17b-33: bral ba'i gzugs spangs nas sgeg pa la sogs pa'i
T02D1795:17b-34: nyams dang yang dag par ldan pa'i gzugs can nyid
T02D1795:17b-35: du'o // mthong ste zhes bya ba ni rnam par gzigs nas te /
T02D1795:17b-36: cang mi smra bar gyur nas /
T02D1795:17b-37: de la 'khor rnams yang dag par 'khod par gyur to zhes bya ba dang 'brel to //
T02D1795:17b-38: ngag gis brjod par bya ba nyid du mi nus pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1795:18a-1: yang ji lta bu zhe na /
T02D1795:18a-2: de'i phyir ngo mtshar skyes te /
T02D1795:18a-3: mig gdangs nas zhes gsungs te /
T02D1795:18a-4: 'dod chags dang bral ba'i gzugs spangs pa'i ngo mtshar bas mig gdangs pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1795:18a-6: de'i phyir ri mor bkod pa lta bu zhes gsungs te ;
T02D1795:18a-7: ji ltar rtsig pa la ri mo mkhan gyis bris
T02D1795:18a-8: pa'i skyes pa la sogs pa smra ba dang brjod
T02D1795:18a-9: par mi nus pa de bzhin du'o //
T02D1795:18a-11: bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa sgrib pa thams cad
T02D1795:18a-12: spangs pa ji ltar 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor 'di lta
T02D1795:18a-13: bu'i dbus su sngon gyi cha lugs yongs su dor
T02D1795:18a-14: nas 'os pa ma yin pa'i sgeg pa la sogs
T02D1795:18a-15: pa'i nyams dang yang dag par ldan pa'i gzugs yang
T02D1795:18a-16: dag par blangs nas rnam par zhugs pa zhes bya
T02D1795:18a-17: ba'o // yang na de lta bu'i gzugs bstan pa
T02D1795:18a-18: la nges par bcom ldan 'das la dgongs pa'i khyad
T02D1795:18a-19: par 'ga' zhig yod par 'gyur snyam pa'o //
T02D1795:18a-20: de ltar 'khor rnams la ngo mtshar bskyed pa bstan nas /
T02D1795:18a-21: da ni yi ge gsum spro ba brjod par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1795:18a-22: de nas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1795:18a-23: de nas zhes bya ba ni 'khor rnams la ngo mtshar bskyed pa bstan ma thag pa'i rjes la'o //
T02D1795:18a-24: bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba ni sngon du bshad zin to //
T02D1795:18a-25: rje btsun rdo rje'i rigs chen po'i snying po 'di gsungs zhes bya ba dang 'brel to //
T02D1795:18a-26: rdo rje chen po ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
T02D1795:18a-27: te stong pa nyid chen po'i ngo bo nyid kyi
T02D1795:18a-28: phyir ro // de rnams kyi rigs ni de rnams kyi rgyud do //
T02D1795:18a-29: de rnams kyi snying po ni skyed par byed pa'i rgyur gyur pa'o //
T02D1795:18a-30: rje btsun zhes bya ba ni sngags ma lus pa
T02D1795:18a-31: thams cad la gtso bor gyur pa nyid kyis mthu
T02D1795:18a-32: chen po dang ldan pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1795:18a-33: gsungs so zhes bya ba ni brjod pa'o //
T02D1795:18a-34: ji lta bu'i bcom ldan 'das she na /
T02D1795:18a-35: rang gi rig mas yang dag par bskul te zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02D1795:18a-36: rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug mas gsol ba 'debs par byed cing bskul pa'o //
T02D1795:18a-37: ci zhig byas nas she na /
T02D1795:18a-38: de'i phyir phyag rgya chen po'i rnal 'byor nye bar
T02D1795:18a-39: bsdus nas snyoms par 'jug pa sngon du 'gro bas
T02D1795:18a-40: rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal bar zhugs pa'i mtshan nyid
T02D1795:18a-41: nyams su myong nas zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1795:18b-1: de'i phyir de nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02D1795:18b-3: mgrin pa dang snying ga'i gnas rnams la rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du'o //
T02D1795:18b-4: yang na nyid kyi sku las gnas brgyad du kun nas re gnas ngag gis de brjod pa'o //
T02D1795:18b-6: aom a'a:h'um zhes bya ba ni de la don gyis
T02D1795:18b-7: stong pa'i yid ni aom zhes bya ba'i don to
T02D1795:18b-8: // gdod ma nas ma skyes pa'i chos rnams a'a:'i
T02D1795:18b-9: rnam pa'i ngo bo la nye bar mtshon pas yang
T02D1795:18b-10: dag par rtogs pa'i phyir a'a: zhes bya'o //
T02D1795:18b-11: lus kyang yin la dag kyang yin te /
T02D1795:18b-12: yid kyang yin pas na h'um zhes bya'o //
T02D1795:18b-13: de ltar yi ge gsum spro ba bstan nas /
T02D1795:18b-14: da ni dkyil 'khor pa spro ba brjod pa'i phyir /
T02D1795:18b-15: de nas de skad gsungs ma thag tu shes bya ba gsungs te /
T02D1795:18b-16: de nas zhes bya ba ni yi ge gsum brjod pa'i rjes su'o //
T02D1795:18b-17: 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis zhes bya ba ni yi
T02D1795:18b-18: ge gsum bcom ldan 'das kyis brjod pa tsam gyis
T02D1795:18b-19: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang /
T02D1795:18b-22: khro bo'o rgyal po rnams byung bar gyur to zhes bya ba dang 'brel to //
T02D1795:18b-23: thams cad kyang yin la de bzhin gshegs pa yang yin pas na /
T02D1795:18b-24: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni mi bskyod pa la sogs pa lnga rnams so //
T02D1795:18b-25: rig ma ni lhan cig spyod ma dang rjes su spyod ma'i dbye bas dgu'o //
T02D1795:18b-26: 'di rnams kyis 'od gsal ba'i de kho na nyid rig par mdzad pas na rig ma'o //
T02D1795:18b-27: byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba ni sngon du bshad zin to //
T02D1795:18b-28: sa'i snying po la sogs pa brgyad do //
T02D1795:18b-29: khro bo'i rgyal po rnams zhes bya ba ni gshin rje mthar byed la sogs pa bcu rnams so //
T02D1795:18b-30: 'di rnams la gnyis ldan gyi bsdu ba'o //
T02D1795:18b-31: phyung bar gyur to zhes bya ba ni byung bar gyur pa'o //
T02D1795:18b-33: de'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi sku las zhes gsungs te /
T02D1795:18b-34: mchog tu sgeg pa'i nyams dang ldan pa len pa'i sku las so //
T02D1795:18b-35: ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1795:18b-36: bcom ldan 'das kyi sku la gnas pa'i bu ga rnams las zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1795:18b-37: phyung nas zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1795:18b-39: bcom ldan 'das kyis zhes bya ba ni ston pa'i'o //
T02D1795:18b-40: shar la sogs pa'i phyogs su zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1795:19a-1: dang byang gi phyogs rnams dang /
T02D1795:19a-4: rlung dang dpang ldan la sogs pa rnams la mdor bsdus te /
T02D1795:19a-5: sgrub thabs su gsungs pa'i rim pas gnas par gyur pa ni bzhugs par gyur pa ste /
T02D1795:19a-6: zla ba la sogs pa'i gdan rnams la shes bya ba ni lhag ma'o //
T02D1795:19a-7: rgyas par bshad pa bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D1795:19a-8: kha cig ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi rnam pa'o zhes gsungs te /
T02D1795:19a-9: me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi ngo khyad par du snang bas na /
T02D1795:19a-10: rnam par snang mdzad de de'i rnam pa zhal gsum phyag drug pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1795:19a-11: kha cig ni rin chen 'byung ldan gyi rnam pas so zhes bya ba ste /
T02D1795:19a-12: rin po che ni yid la re ba thams cad skong bar byed pa /
T02D1795:19a-13: sems can rnams la mnyam pa nyid kyis phongs pa'i
T02D1795:19a-14: sdug bsngal 'joms pa gang las 'byung ba de ni
T02D1795:19a-16: de'i rnam pa zhes bya ba sngon bzhin no //
T02D1795:19a-17: kha cig ni 'od dpag tu med pa'i rnam pa'o
T02D1795:19a-18: zhes bya ba ni dpag tu med pa ni gzhal
T02D1795:19a-20: 'od ni so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyi rnam pa'o //
T02D1795:19a-21: de gang la yod pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
T02D1795:19a-22: kha cig ni gnod mdzes rgyal po dang gtsug tor
T02D1795:19a-23: 'khor los sgyur ba'i bar gyi rnam pa'o zhes bya
T02D1795:19a-24: ba ni gzhan rnams kyang bar du bsdus nas gsungs
T02D1795:19a-25: pa'o ; / dbang po la sogs pa'i 'jig rten
T02D1795:19a-26: skyong ba 'bigs par byed pas na gnod mdzes so
T02D1795:19a-27: pa'o ; // de nyid kyi ngo bos gsal bar byed pas na gnod mdzes rgyal po'o //
T02D1795:19a-28: gtsug tor lag pa gnyis kyis bzung nas dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i steng du gnas pas na /
T02D1795:19a-30: de'i rnam pa ni de'i ngo bos so zhes bya
T02D1795:19a-31: ba'i sgra ni yongs su rdzogs pa'i mtshams sbyor ro
T02D1795:19a-32: // de ltar rgyas bar bshad pa bstan nas /
T02D1795:19a-33: bcom ldan 'das kyi gnas skabs gzhan brjod pa'i phyir /
T02D1795:19a-34: de nas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1795:19a-35: dkyil 'khor pa rnams rang rang gi stan la 'khod pa'i rjes la'o //
T02D1795:19a-36: bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad pa ni sngar bzhin no //
T02D1795:19a-37: yud tsam zhig ces bya ba ni skad cig tsam mo //
T02D1795:19a-38: cang mi gsung bar bzhugs so zhes bya ba ni mi smra bar ro //
T02D1795:19a-39: bzhugs pa ni 'chad par 'gyur ba'i sgra brjod pa'i don du'o //
T02D1795:19b-0: ji ltar don gsum @19b gyis dkyil 'khor pa rnams spro ba bstan nas /
T02D1795:19b-1: da ni gsol ba 'debs pa brjod par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1795:19b-2: de'i yan lag tu gyur ba 'khor rnams kyi bya ba brjod pa bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D1795:19b-3: ji snyed kyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1795:19b-4: bcom ldan 'das la 'khor gyi ngo bos gnas pa'o //
T02D1795:19b-5: thams cad kyis zhes bya ba ni bgrangs pa dang ma bgrangs pa'o //
T02D1795:19b-6: byang chub sems dpa' ni nam mkha'i khams khyab pa'o //
T02D1795:19b-7: dbyangs gcig gis zhes bya ba ni mgrin gcig gis so //
T02D1795:19b-8: dbyangs kyis smras pa zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1795:19b-9: ae ma'o rdo rje rigs chen po //
T02D1795:19b-10: zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'chad par 'gyur ba'i sgra brjod par gyur pa'o //
T02D1795:19b-11: ae ma'o zhes bya ba ni ngo mtshar ba la'o //
T02D1795:19b-12: rdo rje rigs chen po zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1795:19b-13: rdo rje chen po ni rdo rje 'chang ngo //
T02D1795:19b-14: de'i rigs ni de'i rgyud do //
T02D1795:19b-15: de'i bod pa la yang de skad ces bya'o //
T02D1795:19b-16: rdo rje theg pa zhes bya ba nis ngar bshad pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi sngags kyi theg pa'o //
T02D1795:19b-17: de'i don ni rim pa gnyis la brten nas 'jig
T02D1795:19b-18: rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dngos grub bsgrub
T02D1795:19b-19: pa'o // de mdzad pa ni ston par byed pa'o //
T02D1795:19b-20: de bzhin du ae ma'o zhes bya ba sngon bzhin no //
T02D1795:19b-21: rdo rje theg pa gsal zhes bya ba la /
T02D1795:19b-22: rdo rje theg pa ni bshad ma thag pa'o //
T02D1795:19b-23: de la gsal ba ni bcom ldan 'das kyi bdag po'i rkyen gyis de bsgrub pa'i phyir //
T02D1795:19b-24: rnam par rtog pa'i mun pa rnams kyi gnyen po
T02D1795:19b-25: nyid du gyur pa'i phyir ro// chos kyi dbyings kyi
T02D1795:19b-26: don mdzad ces bya ba ni chos kyi dbyings thog
T02D1795:19b-27: ma dang tha ma med pa nyid kyi rigs so
T02D1795:19b-28: // de nyid ni don te thar pa 'dod pa
T02D1795:19b-29: rnams kyis don du gnyer bar bya ba'i phyir ro
T02D1795:19b-30: // // de ston par mdzad pa ni spros pa
T02D1795:19b-31: sna tshogs pa'i sgo nas de nyid ston par byed
T02D1795:19b-32: pa'i phyir ro zhes lan gsum brjod nas zhes bya
T02D1795:19b-33: ba ni de lta bur gyur pa'i tshigs su bcad
T02D1795:19b-34: // // pa'o // gsum ni lan gsum du'o //
T02D1795:19b-35: brjod nas zhes bya ba ni smras nas so //
T02D1795:19b-36: rdo rje 'chang chen po de la zhes bya ba
T02D1795:19b-37: ni gang gis sngar gsungs pa'i cho 'phrul bstan pa
T02D1795:19b-38: de nyid rdo rje 'chang chen po ste /
T02D1795:19b-39: stong pa nyid chen po 'chang ba'o //
T02D1795:19b-40: bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1795:19b-41: rnam par rtog pa thams cad 'joms par byed pa'o //
T02D1795:20a-0: de ltar tshig gnyis po 'dis ye shes dang spangs pa phun sum @20a * //
T02D1795:20a-2: phyag byas nas zhes bya ba ni lus kyi dkyil 'khor phyag la sogs pa rnams kyis so //
T02D1795:20a-3: rang rang gi stan la shes bya ba ni /
T02D1795:20a-4: zla ba dang nyi ma dang padma'i gdan la sogs pa rnams la'o //
T02D1795:20a-5: 'dug par gyur to zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1795:20a-7: de ltar 'khor rnams kyi bya ba bstan nas /
T02D1795:20a-8: gsol ba 'debs pa rtsom pa bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D1795:20a-9: de nas de'i tshe zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1795:20a-10: 'khor rnams rang rang gi stan la 'khod pa'i rjes la'o //
T02D1795:20a-11: skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1795:20a-12: skad cig se gol gtogs pa tsam //
T02D1795:20a-13: thang cig yungs kar sgril ba ste //
T02D1795:20a-15: zhes bya ba'i mtshan nyid kyis te /
T02D1795:20a-16: phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to zhes bya ba dang 'brel to //
T02D1795:20a-17: ci zhig byas nas she na /
T02D1795:20a-18: de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
T02D1795:20a-19: 'khor 'dul ba chen po de rnams mthong nas zhes
T02D1795:20a-21: gnas gcig tu 'dus pa gzigs nas so //
T02D1795:20a-22: de'i phyir rgya chen po zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02D1795:20a-23: grangs la sogs pa rnams kyis bcad pa med pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1795:20a-24: de ltar gsol ba 'debs pa la rtsom pa bstan nas /
T02D1795:20a-25: da ni dngos su gsol ba 'debs pa brjod pa'i phyir /
T02D1795:20a-26: bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1795:20a-27: ye shes gsum dang lhan cig tu gyur pa'i rang
T02D1795:20a-28: bzhin gyi tshogs spangs pa'i phyir ro// bcom ldan 'das
T02D1795:20a-29: de la bod pa gang yin pa de yang de
T02D1795:20a-31: ye shes rdo rje nyi ma zhes bya ba la ;
T02D1795:20a-32: ye shes ni ye shes lnga'i bdag nyid do //
T02D1795:20a-33: de'i rang bzhin gyi rdo rje ni ye shes kyi rdo rje'o //
T02D1795:20a-34: de nyid ni nyi ma ste de'i 'bras bu med pa'i phyir ye shes rdo rje'i nyi ma'o //
T02D1795:20a-35: 'bras bu de nyid gsungs pa nas //
T02D1795:20a-36: gsang ba'i padma rab rgyas pa //
T02D1795:20a-38: gsang ba'i rnam pa'i snying ga'i padma'am /
T02D1795:20a-39: gsang ba ni snying ga mtshon pa'i padma'o //
T02D1795:20a-40: rab tu rgyas par byed pa ni kha 'byed pa ste /
T02D1795:20a-41: de gang la yod pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
T02D1795:20a-42: dam tshig chen po zhes bya ba ni /

T02D1795:42a-4: mchog ni khyad par du 'phags pa ste /
T02D1795:42a-5: lhan cig skyes pa nyams su myong ba mngon par
T02D1795:42a-6: gsal ba'i rgyur gyur la de'i gdong gang la yod
T02D1795:42a-7: pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
T02D1795:42a-8: gang phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1795:42a-9: 'di'i snying la zhes bya ba ni padma'i dbus kyi ze 'u 'bru'i cha la'o //
T02D1795:42a-10: rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma zhes bya ba
T02D1795:42a-11: ni myos byed kyi gdugs can gyi khong stong gi
T02D1795:42a-12: nang du'o // bzhugs zhes bya ba ni rang bzhin gyis gnas pa'o //
T02D1795:42a-13: rang nyid ces bya ba ni stong nyid kyi ngo bos zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1795:42a-14: thabs gzhan gyis ni zhes bya ba ni da ltar
T02D1795:42a-15: rtsod pa'i dus la phyag rgya dang yang dag par
T02D1795:42a-16: sbyor ba'i thabs spangs nas so //
T02D1795:42a-17: sangs rgyas nyid ces bya ba ni rdo rje 'chang nyid do //
T02D1795:42a-18: thob mi 'gyur zhes bya ba ni rnyed par mi 'gyur ba ste /
T02D1795:42a-19: 'dod chags shas che ba'i phyir dang /
T02D1795:42a-20: sems can rnams shes rab dman pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1795:42a-21: rnal 'byor pa yis zhes bya ba ni dpal gsang
T02D1795:42a-22: ba 'dus pa'i rgyud kyi don sgom pa po rnams
T02D1795:42a-23: kyis so // de yang zhes bya ba ni rdo
T02D1795:42a-24: rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma'i rang bzhin can gyi
T02D1795:42a-26: rnam pa shin tu phra zhes bya ba ni sgrib
T02D1795:42a-27: pa dang bral ba nyid kyis dmigs pa'i yul las
T02D1795:42a-28: shin tu 'das pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1795:42a-29: de bzhin rnal 'byor ba yis rtogs //
T02D1795:42a-30: zhes bya ba ni yang dag nyid kyi gdams dag thob pa'i sgom pa po nyid kyis rtogs pa'o //
T02D1795:42a-31: bde ba chen po zhes bya ba ni kun rdzob
T02D1795:42a-32: dang don dam pa'i rnam pa byang chub kyi sems
T02D1795:42a-34: bsten pa gyis zhes bya ba ni slob mar gyur pa khyod kyis so //
T02D1795:42a-35: rab tu 'chad bas zhes bya ba ni brtson 'grus kyis so //
T02D1795:42a-38: lhan cig skyes dga'i mtshan nyid ni //
T02D1795:42a-40: de mngon par gsal bar byed pa'i rgyu nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1795:42a-41: de ltar rig pa'i brtul zhugs brjod pa bstan nas /
T02D1795:42a-42: da ni de'i 'thad pa brjod pa'i phyir /
T02D1795:42a-43: dbang bskur gtso bor gyur pas na //
T02D1795:42b-0: dbang bzhi po gtso bor @42b gyur pa'i skyes pas gang zhig gang gi phyir ro //
T02D1795:42b-1: thams cad ces bya ba ni 'jig rten las 'das
T02D1795:42b-2: pa'i dngos grub ngo bo'i 'bras bu thob par byed
T02D1795:42b-3: pa'o // de'i phyir phyag rgya ma thams cad spang
T02D1795:42b-4: bar mi bya ba'i dgos pa zhes bya ba'i don
T02D1795:42b-5: pa'o // to // pandi ta aa langka ka la
T02D1795:42b-6: sha de bas mdzad pa'i rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud
T02D1795:42b-7: dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i rgya cher 'grel pa zab
T02D1795:42b-8: mo'i don gsal bar byed pa las le'u gnyis pa'i
T02D1795:42b-11: // / de ltar le'u gnyis kyis thun mong ba'i rgyud kyi don bshad nas /
T02D1795:42b-12: da ni thun mong ma yin pa'i rgyud kyi don brjod par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1795:42b-13: de'i don du rdo rje phreng ba'i dri ba gsal
T02D1795:42b-14: ba rang gi ngo bo bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung
T02D1795:42b-15: la 'jug pa ni de nas zhes bya ba la
T02D1795:42b-16: sogs pa ste / le'u gnyis pa bshad pa'i rjes la /
T02D1795:42b-17: gzhan yang zhes bya ba ni snga ma la ltos pas so //
T02D1795:42b-18: rdo rje phreng ba'i don gsal ba //
T02D1795:42b-20: phyag na rdo rje khyod nyon cig ;
T02D1795:42b-21: / ces bya ba ni thos pa la sbyar ba'o //
T02D1795:42b-22: de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung la 'jug pa bshad nas /
T02D1795:42b-23: da ni gtso bo'i don gyi ngo bo brjod par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1795:42b-24: rdo rje phreng ba zhes bya ba'i ming zhes gsungs te /
T02D1795:42b-25: khyod kyi dri pa dang po gsal ba'i ngo bo de yang /
T02D1795:42b-26: sa ni bcu gsum pa zhes brjod de /
T02D1795:42b-27: kun du 'od kyis la brjod de /
T02D1795:42b-28: ji ltar sngar bstan pa bzhin du'o //
T02D1795:42b-29: mthar thug par gyur pa 'jig rten las 'das pa'i
T02D1795:42b-30: ye shes kyis rtogs par gyur pa'i rten nyid kyi
T02D1795:42b-32: sangs rgyas thams cad brten pa dang //
T02D1795:42b-33: sa 'di nyid kyang bcu gsum pa //
T02D1795:42b-34: de yang btsun mo zhes brjod de //
T02D1795:42b-35: de yi chos ni bha gar brjod //
T02D1795:42b-37: dga' ba bzhi ni don gyi gnas //
T02D1795:42b-38: zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud kyi
T02D1795:42b-39: dgongs pas mngon par byang chub pa'i rim pa dang
T02D1795:42b-40: / zung du 'jug pa'i ngo bo ste /
T02D1795:42b-41: rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi dgongs pas dga' ba bzhi'i
T02D1795:42b-42: ngo bo don gyi lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba'i
T02D1795:42b-43: mtshan nyid gsang ba'i rim pa'i ming gi rnam grangs
T02D1795:42b-45: thams cad stong pa zhes bya ba ni spros pa thams cad dang bral ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1795:42b-46: bde ba chen po zhes bya ba ni bde ba
T02D1795:42b-47: chen po dang rgyu mthun pa nyid kyi phyir ro
T02D1795:43a-2: thob pa'i phyir ni bde ba che //
T02D1795:43a-4: gzhan yang dag gi spyod yul las 'das zhes bya
T02D1795:43a-5: ba ni gcig tu rnal 'byor pa'i spyod yul nyid
T02D1795:43a-6: kyis dag gi spyod yul kun las 'das pa'i phyir
T02D1795:43a-7: ro // gnyis po thams cad rnam par spangs //
T02D1795:43a-8: zhes bya ba ni gnyis su med pa nyid kyis
T02D1795:43a-9: tha dad pa'i rnam par rtog pa las yang dag
T02D1795:43a-10: par 'das pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1795:43a-12: gang la mtshams kye mtha' ni gzi brjid 'jig med
T02D1795:43a-13: mun nag tshogs ni ma lus gang du 'das pa
T02D1795:43a-14: dang // ji srid nyi ma shar du skad cig
T02D1795:43a-15: 'dir ni dri ma med pa yang dag mtha' ni
T02D1795:43a-16: dang // bshad // slob ma la ni slob dpon
T02D1795:43a-17: gtso bo rab rib rnam par bcom pas phyi rol
T02D1795:43a-19: nang gi bde ba thob nas ci phyir mchog gi
T02D1795:43a-20: go 'phang sangs rgyas byang chub skad cig gis thob
T02D1795:43a-22: skal bzangs rnal 'byor kun sogs kyi ;
T02D1795:43a-23: zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor kun ces bya ba
T02D1795:43a-24: bskyed pa'i rim pa nas brtsams nas rdzogs pa'i rim
T02D1795:43a-25: pa'i mthar thug pa rnams kyi mtha' ni 'od gsal
T02D1795:43a-27: des skal pa bzang po ni spangs pa dang ye
T02D1795:43a-28: shes phun sum tshogs pa gnyis dang yang dag par
T02D1795:43a-29: ldan pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1795:43a-31: rnal 'byor ma yi dag gi yul //
T02D1795:43a-32: zhes bya ba ni rang nyid kyis tshad ma'i spyod yul ma yin pa ste /
T02D1795:43a-33: ye shes mkha' 'gro ma'i zhal nas brgyud nas yul du gyur pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1795:43a-34: de ltar rnam pa gnyis kyis gtso bo'i don bshad nas /
T02D1795:43a-35: da ni gtso bo ma yin pa'i don kun rdzob
T02D1795:43a-36: tu lhan cig skyes pa'i ngo bo nyid brjod pa'i
T02D1795:43a-37: phyir / stong nyid ye shes rdo rje dang //
T02D1795:43a-39: rdo rje phreng ba'i sgras ni stong nyid ye shes rdo rje la brjod de /
T02D1795:43a-40: khong stong nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1795:43a-41: ye shes ni lhan cig skyes pa nyams su myong ba'i phyir ro //
T02D1795:43a-42: rdo rje ni rnam par rtog pa 'joms pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1795:43a-43: de ltar mdor bstan pa bshad nas /
T02D1795:43a-44: da ni rgyas par bshad pa bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D1795:43a-45: stong nyid rdo rje gsang pad rtsa //
T02D1795:43a-47: rdo rje gsang ba ni thabs kyi yan lag tu gyur pa'o //
T02D1795:43a-48: chu skyes ni lha mo'i padma'o //
T02D1795:43b-0: de dag @43b gi rtsa ni nang du stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa aa ba dh'u t'i'o //
T02D1795:43b-1: de nyid ni rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma ste /
T02D1795:43b-2: khams thams cad nye bar sdud par byed pas na gtso mo'o //
T02D1795:43b-3: mchog ces bya ba ni sgra gcan dang dus kyi
T02D1795:43b-4: me nye bar sdud par byed pa nyid kyi phyir
T02D1795:43b-5: ro // 'dis ni de ma thag par bstan pa'i
T02D1795:43b-6: stong pa nyid kyi rgyas par bshad pa gsungs so
T02D1795:43b-7: ro // // ye shes rgyas par bshad pa'i phyir //
T02D1795:43b-8: ye shes mchog tu bde ba che //
T02D1795:43b-10: mchog ces bya ba ni sdug bsngal thams cad 'joms par byed pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1795:43b-11: bde ba chen po zhes bya ba ni kun rdzob
T02D1795:43b-12: dang ni don dam pa'i ngo bo tha mi dad
T02D1795:43b-13: pa'i lhan cig cig skyes dga' zhes bya ba ni
T02D1795:43b-14: don gyis lhan cig skyes pa'i ngo bo'o //
T02D1795:43b-15: do mtshar ba zhes bya ba ni ngo mtshar ba
T02D1795:43b-16: dang bcas pa rgyu'i stobs kyis mngon par gsal ba
T02D1795:43b-18: rdo rje'i sgra bshad pa'i phyir /
T02D1795:43b-19: rdo rje yang rnam rtog rnams //
T02D1795:43b-21: rang bzhin gyi tshogs brgya drug cu po rnams bcom pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1795:43b-22: yongs su grags pa ni brjod pa'o //
T02D1795:43b-23: de yang rnam pa gnyis kyi byang chub kyi sems kyi stobs kyis 'gyur zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1795:43b-24: phreng ba de rnams kyi yang rgyun //
T02D1795:43b-25: zhes bya ba ni byang chub kyi sems kyi thig le rnams so //
T02D1795:43b-27: de'i phyir byang chub sems kyi zhes gsungs te /
T02D1795:43b-30: de'i phyir rdo rje can zhes gsungs te /
T02D1795:43b-31: rdo rje can zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs
T02D1795:43b-32: pa thams cad zhu ba'i bdag nyid can rdo rje'i
T02D1795:43b-33: sku can rnams zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02D1795:43b-34: de ltar rnam pa gnyis kyis kun rdzob pa'i lhan cig skyes pa brjod nas /
T02D1795:43b-35: da ni rnam par rtog pa'i rlung 'byed pa nyid
T02D1795:43b-36: kyis rdo rje phreng ba'i mtshan nyid brjod pa'i phyir
T02D1795:43b-37: bshad par dam bca' ba ni /
T02D1795:43b-38: de nas gzhan yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1795:43b-39: rgyud thams cad rnam pa gnyis kyi byang chub kyi
T02D1795:43b-40: sems kyi ngo bo rdo rje phreng ba bshad pa'i
T02D1795:43b-41: rjes la / rdo rje phreng don sdom pa ni /
T02D1795:43b-42: bshad par bya zhes bya ba dang 'brel to //
T02D1795:43b-43: rdo rje phreng ba'i don ni brjod par bya ba ste /
T02D1795:43b-44: de'i sdom pa ni bsdus pa'i ngo bo //
T02D1795:43b-46: de'i phyir sbas pa ni zhes gsungs te /
T02D1795:44a-0: rgyud thams cad du sbas pa zhes bya ba ni bya ba dang spyod pa la sogs @44a * //
T02D1795:44a-2: skal pa dang mi ldan pa rnams la bstan par bya ba ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1795:44a-3: gang yang rung la brjod mi bya //
T02D1795:44a-4: zhes bya ba ni dam tshig dang mi ldan pa rnams la brjod par mi bya'o //
T02D1795:44a-5: de ltar bshad par dam bca' ba bshad nas /
T02D1795:44a-6: da ni rang gi ngo bo bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D1795:44a-7: mi phyed par ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1795:44a-8: rdo rje dang 'dra ba'i phyir rdo rje'o //
T02D1795:44a-9: des gzhan rnams 'byed par byed cing rang nyid dbyer mi phyed pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1795:44a-10: de ni dbugs su yongs su grags //
T02D1795:44a-11: zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor rnam pa gsum la ltos nas /
T02D1795:44a-12: sna rtse rnam pa gsum la thig le rnam pa gsum 'dzin pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1795:44a-13: rdo rje de'i rdo rje bzlas pa la brten pa'i dbugs rnams kyi phreng ba'i rgyud ni rgyud do //
T02D1795:44a-15: de'i phyir nges pa zhes bya ba ni phyi rol gyi lo'i nang du chu tshod kyi grangs dang /
T02D1795:44a-16: nang du nyin mtshan gyi grangs de tsam gyis rnam par bcad pa'o //
T02D1795:44a-17: dga' ba rab bskyed bdag nyid can //
T02D1795:44a-18: zhes bya ba ni dbugs kyi 'khor lo nyams su myong ba'i rim pas dang /
T02D1795:44a-19: phyi dang nang gi bdag nyid can gyi thabs dang shes rab snyoms par 'jug pas /
T02D1795:44a-20: dga' bzhi skyed par byed pa'o //
T02D1795:44a-21: rnam rtog rlung kun 'bigs par byed //
T02D1795:44a-22: ces bya ba ni 'khor lo'i grangs kyis skyes pa'i
T02D1795:44a-23: dbugs ni rlung thams cad brgya rtsa brgyad kyi dbye
T02D1795:44a-24: bas phye ba rnams la 'byed pa byed pa ni
T02D1795:44a-25: / rlung dang sngags kyi de kho na nyid kyi rim pas zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1795:44a-26: de nyid kyi rlung gis 'bigs par mi nus zhes gsungs te /
T02D1795:44a-27: de nyid gzhan gyi dbang du gyur pa med pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1795:44a-28: rlung rnams la 'phigs pa zhes bya bar brjod de /
T02D1795:44a-29: rlung rnams ni gang zhig yin snyam du mi shes nas de'i phyir /
T02D1795:44a-30: nyin dang mtshan mo nges par ni //
T02D1795:44a-31: brgya dang brgyad lhag gas 'khar yang //
T02D1795:44a-34: 'dir re zhig bcom ldan 'das kyis phung po dang
T02D1795:44a-35: dbang po'i rlung gi dbye bas rdo rje'i sgo zhes
T02D1795:44a-36: bya ba rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud las rlung bcu
T02D1795:44a-37: po gsungs pa / ji skad du /
T02D1795:44a-38: srog dang thur sel mnyam gnas dang //
T02D1795:44a-39: gyen rgyu khyab byed ces bya dang //
T02D1795:44a-40: klu dang rus sbal rtsangs pa dang //
T02D1795:44a-41: lha sbyin dang ni nor rgyal lo //
T02D1795:44b-1: de ltar na khyab byed ces bya ba'i rlung bcu pa bzhag nas dgu po yod par 'gyur te /
T02D1795:44b-2: gang gi phyir de bya ba dang bral ba dang /
T02D1795:44b-3: lus thams cad la khyab par byed pa'o //
T02D1795:44b-4: de bas na de las gzhan pa'i dbus su tha dad pa nyid dang /
T02D1795:44b-5: bya ba dang ldan pa nyid kyis yongs su klog pa ma yin no //
T02D1795:44b-7: lus kun la ni gnas pa'i rlung //
T02D1795:44b-8: bya ba kun la 'jug pa ni //
T02D1795:44b-9: 'di ni rnam snang ngo bo ste //
T02D1795:44b-12: de ltar 'di spangs ba'i dbugs dgu 'chad par 'gyur
T02D1795:44b-13: ba'i 'khor lo drug gi grangs kyis nyin par lnga
T02D1795:44b-15: mtshan mo yang de nyid de gnyis ka bsdus nas brgya rtsa brgyad du 'gyur zhes so //
T02D1795:44b-16: yang na rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi dgongs pas de
T02D1795:44b-17: rnams nyid khyab byed kyi rlung spangs pa'i rlung dgu
T02D1795:44b-18: po sprul pa la sogs pa'i 'khor lo bzhi'i dbye
T02D1795:44b-19: bas sum cu rtsa drug tu 'gyur ro//
T02D1795:44b-22: ldang ba yongs su brtags pas brgya rtsa brgyad du 'gro bar 'gyur zhes gsungs so //
T02D1795:44b-23: gsal bar yang zhes bya ba ni 'khor lo la sogs pa'i grangs so //
T02D1795:44b-24: rnam rtog rang bzhin rlung rnams ni //
T02D1795:44b-25: zhes bya ba ni rlung gi dbang gis rnam par
T02D1795:44b-26: shes pa'i yul rnams 'dzin pas 'byung ba'i rnam rtog
T02D1795:44b-27: rang bzhin brgya rtsa brgyad kyi grangs su rlung rnams
T02D1795:44b-29: de dang de rnams la 'char ba rnams la 'joms pa can ni rnam par bzlog pa'o //
T02D1795:44b-30: de bzhin du 'dir yang gdams ngag ste /
T02D1795:44b-31: dang po nyid du rim pa lnga la brten nas /
T02D1795:44b-32: grangs la sogs pa'i rim pa rlung gi de kho
T02D1795:44b-33: na nyid du dang thig le'i ngo bo bsgom pas
T02D1795:44b-34: / sngags kyi de kho na nyid dag ni thun
T02D1795:44b-35: phyed phyed kyi bar du rnal 'byor rnam pa gsum
T02D1795:44b-36: / la ltos nas / thig le gsum po rim pa bzhin du nye bar mtshon par byas nas /
T02D1795:44b-37: phyi nas 'jug pa dang ldang ba dag la rim
T02D1795:44b-38: pa de nyid kyi aa yig gi rnam pas gnas
T02D1795:44b-39: pa'i rlung la nges par sbyar nas de nyid du
T02D1795:44b-40: thig le'i ngo bo bsgoms pas /
T02D1795:44b-41: rlung phra mo'i nye bar mtshon nas de nyid du
T02D1795:44b-42: bskal pa 'am bskal pa stong gi bar du gnas
T02D1795:45a-0: de ltar rdo rje phreng ba'i dri ba sel ba'i ngo bo @45a * //
T02D1795:45a-2: mi mthun pa'i phyogs brjod pa'i yan lag gi rlung rnams kyi ngo bo bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D1795:45a-3: rlung rnams kyi ming nyon cig ces gsungs te /
T02D1795:45a-4: ming zhes bya ba ni 'chad bzhin pa'o //
T02D1795:45a-5: ji lta bar zhes bya ba ni slob ma la sogs pa'i dbye bas te rnam pa dgus so ;
T02D1795:45a-6: / rab tu dbye bas brgya rtsa brgyad kyi grangs kyis so //
T02D1795:45a-7: btang bzung dang zhes bya ba ni sprul pa'i 'khor
T02D1795:45a-8: lor gnas pa'i yang dag shugs kyi rtsa la brten
T02D1795:45a-9: nas de nyid kyi nam mkha'i sgo nas btang ba
T02D1795:45a-11: slar yang nang nyid du gzung bas na btang bzung ste /
T02D1795:45a-13: dung phyur zhes bya ba ni shin tu shugs kyi
T02D1795:45a-14: rtsa la brten nas aa dang ri dag gis rtogs
T02D1795:45a-15: pa zhes bya ba ni dung phyur te /
T02D1795:45a-16: rlung gnyis pa thur sel gyi rlung ngo //
T02D1795:45a-17: myos pa dang zhes bya ba ni shin tu bzang
T02D1795:45a-18: ba'i rtsa la brten nas zos pa'i dngos po mnyam
T02D1795:45a-19: par byas nas chu'i rgyun ltar gcig tu byas pa'i
T02D1795:45a-20: las nyid kyi phyir myos byed kyi rlung gi mnyam
T02D1795:45a-22: rtogs dka' zhes bya ba ni bzang por 'gro pa'i rtsa ba la brten nas /
T02D1795:45a-23: steng du 'gro ba sdud par byed pa'i phyir dka' bas rtogs pas na //
T02D1795:45a-24: rtogs dka'i rlung ni gyen rgyu'i rlung ngo //
T02D1795:45a-25: bsil byed dang ni zhes bya ba ni stobs chen
T02D1795:45a-26: gyi rlung la brten nas rnam pa gsum gyi gzugs
T02D1795:45a-27: kyi yul la bsil byed bzhin du 'gro bar byed
T02D1795:45a-28: pas na / bsil byed bzhin gyi rlung ngo //
T02D1795:45a-29: g-ya' ba dang zhes bya ba ni mi bzad che'i
T02D1795:45a-30: rtsa la brten nas rnam pa gsum gyi sgra'i yul
T02D1795:45a-31: la slar yang nyan par 'dod pas g-ya' pa ma
T02D1795:45a-32: bzlog pa bzhin du g-ya' ba ni rnam par rgyu
T02D1795:45a-33: ba'i rlung ngo // dar sna bas dang zhes bya
T02D1795:45a-34: ba ni mdzes chen gyi rtsa la brten nas dri
T02D1795:45a-35: rnam gsum gyi yul la ngar snabs bzhin du yongs
T02D1795:45a-36: su ma spangs pa nyid kyis yongs su shes pa'i
T02D1795:45a-37: ba'i rlung ngo // phyir / ngar snabs ni yang dag par rgyu ba'i rlung ngo //
T02D1795:45a-38: sta re dang zhes bya ba ni mdun du skyes
T02D1795:45a-39: pa che ba'i rtsa la brten nas ri'i yul gsum
T02D1795:45a-40: la sta re bzhin du 'dun pa log par skyed
T02D1795:45a-41: par byed pa na sta re rab tu rgyu ba'o
T02D1795:45a-42: // zegs pa zhes bya ba ni rgyags pa'i rtags
T02D1795:45a-43: kyi rtsa la brten nas reg bya rnam pa gsum
T02D1795:45a-44: // gzung nas / yongs su ngal ba'i phyir zegs pa ni nges par rgyu ba'i rlung ngo //
T02D1795:45a-45: dza sha zhes bya ba ni chos kyi 'khor lo'i
T02D1795:45b-0: ze'u 'bru la myur du 'jug pa'i phyir @45b dza
T02D1795:45b-1: sha ste / srog gi rlung nyid do //
T02D1795:45b-2: rnam par brtsigs dang zhes bya ba ni rin chen
T02D1795:45b-3: gyi rtsa la brten nas rlung dang bshad gci rnam
T02D1795:45b-4: par brtsigs pa rnams la skyug bro ba ster bar
T02D1795:45b-5: byed pa zlog par byed pa nyid kyis rnam par
T02D1795:45b-6: brtsigs pa ni thur sel gyi rlung ngo //
T02D1795:45b-7: myos pa'i rtsod pa zhes bya ba ni padma che'i
T02D1795:45b-8: rtsa la brten nas myos pa skyed par byed pa
T02D1795:45b-9: rnams la bza' ba dang bca' ba rnams la rtsod
T02D1795:45b-10: pa dang 'dra bas na rtsod pa ste /
T02D1795:45b-11: de'i rnam par rtog pa'i mi snang bar byas pas
T02D1795:45b-12: na myos pa rtsod pa ni mnyam gnas kyi rlung
T02D1795:45b-13: ngo // rdo rje chen po'i rtsa la brten nas
T02D1795:45b-14: gyen du 'gro bas lus myos par byed pas na
T02D1795:45b-15: 'dod myos ni gyen du rgyu ba'i rlung ngo //
T02D1795:45b-16: chub zhes bya ba ni stobs po che la brten nas /
T02D1795:45b-17: gzugs kyi yul 'dzin pa la chub dang 'dra bas na chub la ster bar 'gyur ba'i phyir /
T02D1795:45b-18: chub ni gyen du rgyu ba'i rlung ngo //
T02D1795:45b-19: shi shu zhes bya ba ni mgo bo che'i rtsa
T02D1795:45b-20: la brten nas sgra'i yul la shi shu ltar 'gro
T02D1795:45b-21: bas na shi shu ni rnam par rgyu ba'i rlung
T02D1795:45b-22: ngo // sna tshogs skyed ces bya ba ni sgra chen po'i rtsa la brten nas /
T02D1795:45b-23: sna tshogs pa'i lto ba na gnas pas dril 'byung bar byed pas na /
T02D1795:45b-24: sna tshogs skyed pa'i rlung ni yang dag par rgyu ba'i rlung ngo //
T02D1795:45b-25: sdud pa dang zhes bya ba ni dga' ba chen
T02D1795:45b-26: po'i rtsa la brten nas khyad par du ro'i yul
T02D1795:45b-27: la 'byung ba'i phyir sdud pa ni rab tu rgyu
T02D1795:45b-28: ba'i rlung ngo ; / snyems dang zhes bya ba
T02D1795:45b-29: ni myos pa che'i rtsa la brten nas reg bya'i
T02D1795:45b-30: yul la longs spyod pas rnam par snyems par byed
T02D1795:45b-31: pa'i phyir snyems par nges par rgyu ba'i rlung ngo
T02D1795:45b-32: ba'i rlung ngo ; // ta dang zhes bya ba
T02D1795:45b-33: ni mgrin pa'i 'og tu me'i 'khor lo gru gsum
T02D1795:45b-34: pa la da bus dang lhan cig 'dud pa brjod
T02D1795:45b-35: par 'dod pas rtsa dbu ma la brten pa'i grangs
T02D1795:45b-36: kyi mdun dang g-yon pa dang g-yas pa'i nu ma
T02D1795:45b-37: gnyis kyi rtsa la brten nas gnyis yin pas na
T02D1795:45b-38: ba'i rlung ngo ; // dgur 'gyur ro // de
T02D1795:45b-39: la dbus ma la brten nas sgra ta bzhin du
T02D1795:45b-40: 'byung ba lnga ni srog gi rlung ngo //
T02D1795:45b-41: sgra sgrogs zhes bya ba ni dri ma med pa'i rtsa la brten nas /
T02D1795:45b-42: aam yig gi ngo bo'i sgra 'jug pas na sgra ni mnyam gnas kyi rlung ngo //
T02D1795:45b-43: rlung lha dang zhes bya ba ni gsal ba'i rtsa
T02D1795:45b-44: la brten nas thur du sel ba'i rlung 'jug pas
T02D1795:45b-45: na rlung lha ni thur du sel ba'i rlung ngo
T02D1795:45b-46: // gnad ni rnam 'bigs dang zhes bya ba ni
T02D1795:45b-47: rdzogs pa'i rtsal brten nas mgo bo'i nad la sogs
T02D1795:46a-1: rnam par 'bigs pa ni gyen du rgyu ba'i rlung ngo //
T02D1795:46a-2: me dang zhes bya ba ni slar yang dri ma
T02D1795:46a-3: med pa'i rtsal brten pa'i rlung 'jug nas me dang
T02D1795:46a-4: 'dra bar gyen du rgyu bas mig gi dbang po
T02D1795:46a-5: la brten pa'i rlung 'jug pas na me ni gyen
T02D1795:46a-7: ci bgyid ces bya ba ni gsal ba'i rtsal brten
T02D1795:46a-8: nas sgra'i yul la thos pa'i bya ba la ci
T02D1795:46a-9: bgyi bas na ci bgyi ba ni rnam par rgyu
T02D1795:46a-10: ba'i rlung ngo // rtsod pa zhes bya ba ni
T02D1795:46a-11: rdzogs pa'i rtsal brten nas dri'i yul la rgyu mtshan
T02D1795:46a-12: du rtsod pa dang 'dra bar rtsod pas na rtsod
T02D1795:46a-13: pa ni yang dag par rgyu ba'o //
T02D1795:46a-14: aa ma ra zhes bya ba ni nu ma g-yon pa'i rtsa la brten nas /
T02D1795:46a-15: byang chub kyi sems 'o ma'i ngo bo nyid kyis 'bab pas na aa mar rab tu rgyu ba'o //
T02D1795:46a-16: mchog sbyin zhes bya ba ni nu ma g-yas pa'i
T02D1795:46a-17: rtsal brten nas lus gtso bo'i nu ma la reg
T02D1795:46a-18: pa'i yul gyi mchog sbyin pas mchog sbyin te /
T02D1795:46a-20: de yang me'i 'khor lo'i dbyibs kyi ngo bo rgya chen po'i thig le las bshad pa'o //
T02D1795:46a-21: tsu ta zhes bya ba ni longs spyod kyi 'khor
T02D1795:46a-22: lo'i dbus su ze'u 'brul gnas pa lan gsum bskor
T02D1795:46a-24: srog gi rlung tsu ta bzhin du 'jug pas tsu ta'i rlung ngo //
T02D1795:46a-25: tsin tsi ri zhes bya ba ni longs spyod kyi
T02D1795:46a-26: 'khor lo'i shar gyi 'dab ma la gnas pa longs
T02D1795:46a-27: spyod kyi rtsal brten nas thur sel gyi rlung ring
T02D1795:46a-28: du rgyu bar byed pas na /
T02D1795:46a-29: tsin tsi ri ni thur sel gyi rlung ngo //
T02D1795:46a-30: zla ba'i thod ces bya ba ni longs spyod ster
T02D1795:46a-31: ba'i rtsal brten nas gyen gyi zla ba longs spyod
T02D1795:46a-32: kyi 'khor lor gnas pa'i rkan gyi ngo bo mnyam
T02D1795:46a-33: pa'i rlung bskul bas lce'i rtse mor myang bas na
T02D1795:46a-34: zla ba'i thod ni mnyam gnas kyi rlung ngo //
T02D1795:46a-35: kam bo rtse zhes bya ba ni longs spyod kyi
T02D1795:46a-36: 'khor lor gnas shing 'jigs ma'i rtsal brten nas gyen
T02D1795:46a-37: gyi sgor rlung 'jug par byed pas na /
T02D1795:46a-38: kam bo rtse ni gyen du rgyu ba'i rlung ngo //
T02D1795:46a-39: ral pa can zhes bya ba ni gsal ba'i rtsal
T02D1795:46a-40: brten nas gzugs kyi yul rnam pa gsum dang 'dra
T02D1795:46a-42: ral pa can gyen du rgyu ba'o //
T02D1795:46a-43: sgra ma zhes bya ba ni thal ba'i gdong gi
T02D1795:46a-44: rtsal brten nas ro'i sgra rnam pa gsum nyan pa
T02D1795:46a-45: la 'khrugs pa'i phyir sgra can ma rnam par rgyu
T02D1795:46a-46: ba'i rlung ngo // keng rus ma zhes bya ba
T02D1795:46a-47: ni bkres pa'i rtsal brten nas ka te byang chub
T02D1795:46b-0: kyi sems @46b rnam pa gsum dang rgyu mthun pa'i
T02D1795:46b-1: yul la kam ni bskul bar byed pa ste /
T02D1795:46b-2: keng rus ma ni yang dag par rgyu ba'o //
T02D1795:46b-3: rus zhes bya ba ni bcud len ro'i rtsal brten nas sgra rnam pa gsum la bskul bas na /
T02D1795:46b-4: rus ni rab tu rgyu ba'i rlung ngo //
T02D1795:46b-5: 'gugs dang zhes bya ba ni sgyu ma'i rtsal reg
T02D1795:46b-6: bya rnam pa gsum gyi yul 'gugs pa'i phyir rgyu
T02D1795:46b-7: ma ni nges par rgyu ba'i rlung ngo //
T02D1795:46b-8: smin mtshams kyi dbus su gnas pa'i rlung gi 'khor lo la ltos nas brjod par bya ste /
T02D1795:46b-9: de la yang rang nyid rtsi bas drug dang ldan pa nyid kyi phyir /
T02D1795:46b-10: smin ma gnyis dang lhan cig brgyad de dbus ma
T02D1795:46b-11: dang lhan cig dgu zhes bya bar rnam par gzhag
T02D1795:46b-12: go // sdig pa dang zhes bya ba ni dbus
T02D1795:46b-13: ma'i gnas su smin mtshams kyi ngo bos btsugs pa
T02D1795:46b-14: nyid kyi phyir sdig pa ni srog gi rlung ngo
T02D1795:46b-15: go // // g-yon can zhes bya ba ni rlung
T02D1795:46b-16: chen po'i rtsal brten nas bshad ba la sogs pa
T02D1795:46b-17: ste bshad pa la sogs pa ni thur sel gyi
T02D1795:46b-18: go // // rlung ngo // bsil ba zhes bya
T02D1795:46b-19: ba ni bye ba 'khyil ba'i rtsal brten nas steng
T02D1795:46b-20: du gnas pa'i khams mnyam par byed par byed pas
T02D1795:46b-21: bsil ba'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir bsil ba ni
T02D1795:46b-23: mdzes par 'gro ba zhes bya ba ni mi bzad pa'i rtsal brten nas /
T02D1795:46b-24: tshangs pa'i bu ga'i sgo nas mdzes par 'gro ba ni g-yon nas rgyu ba'i rlung ste /
T02D1795:46b-25: mdzes par 'gro ba ni gyen du rgyu ba'i rlung ngo //
T02D1795:46b-26: mgrin pa dang zhes bya ba ni 'dzin byed ma'i
T02D1795:46b-27: rtsal brten nas gzugs kyi yul khyad par sbom la
T02D1795:46b-28: rags pa'i phyir la kandha ra ni gyen du rgyu
T02D1795:46b-29: ba'i rtsa'o // thams cad ma zhes bya ba ni
T02D1795:46b-30: rnam par mi rtog pa'i rtsal brten nas sgra'i yul
T02D1795:46b-31: thams cad la 'khrid pas na thams cad ma ni
T02D1795:46b-32: rnam par rgyu ba'i rlung ngo //
T02D1795:46b-33: mchog ster ma zhes bya ba ni rdzogs pa'i rtsal
T02D1795:46b-34: brten nas dri'i yul la zhen pa bskyed nas phyir
T02D1795:46b-35: mchog ster ma yang dag par rgyu ba'o //
T02D1795:46b-36: smyo byed dang zhes bya ba ni g-yon pa'i smin
T02D1795:46b-37: ma'i mtshams kyi rtsal brten sa ro'i yul la longs
T02D1795:46b-38: spyod pas smyo ba bskyed pa dang 'dra bas na
T02D1795:46b-39: / smyo byed ni rab tu rgyu ba'i rung ngo //
T02D1795:46b-40: nga rgyal 'tshom zhes bya ba ni g-yas pa'i smin
T02D1795:46b-41: ma'i mtshams su gnas nas reg bya'i yul la nga
T02D1795:46b-42: rgyal skyed par byed pas na 'tsho ba dang 'dra
T02D1795:46b-43: bar 'tsho bas nga rgyal 'tsho ni nges par rgyu
T02D1795:46b-44: ba'i rlung ngo zhes bya ba ni bde ba chen
T02D1795:46b-45: po'i 'khor lo la ltos nas brjod pa'o //
T02D1795:47a-1: bdag ces bya ba ni bde ba chen po'i 'khor
T02D1795:47a-2: lo'i dbus kyi gnas la brten nas byang chub kyi
T02D1795:47a-3: sems khyad par du khrid par byed pas na tshogs
T02D1795:47a-4: bdag ni srog gi rlung ngo //
T02D1795:47a-5: rtsangs pa dang zhes bya ba ni rim rigs kyi
T02D1795:47a-6: rtsal brten nas rlung dang bshad gcig tsug bud bzhin
T02D1795:47a-7: du khyer bar byed pas na rtsangs pa ni thur
T02D1795:47a-9: sa'i blo zhes bya ba ni 'dod can ma ni
T02D1795:47a-10: rtsal brten nas gnas pa'i rang bzhin can nor thams
T02D1795:47a-11: cad las khyad par du 'phags pa tshangs pa'i bu
T02D1795:47a-12: ga la blo gros ni 'dun pa'i mtshan nyid can
T02D1795:47a-13: gang la yod pa de ni sa'i blo ma ste
T02D1795:47a-15: theg pa bzang dang zhes bya ba ni 'dod can
T02D1795:47a-16: ma'i rtsal brten nas gyen du rgyu ba la shin
T02D1795:47a-17: tu theg pa bzang ba gang la yod pa de
T02D1795:47a-18: ni theg pa bzang ste gyen du rgyu ba'i rlung
T02D1795:47a-19: ngo // mchog tu skyes zhes bya ba ni srog
T02D1795:47a-20: rnam par 'dzin pa'i rtsal brten nas gzugs 'dzin pa
T02D1795:47a-21: ngo // ste / kun nas ni rnam pa thams
T02D1795:47a-22: cad skyes pa'i phyir mchog tu skyes pa ni gyen
T02D1795:47a-24: dri ma zhes bya ba ni zla gdung gi rtsal
T02D1795:47a-25: brten nas dri ma med pa'i sgra 'dzin pas na
T02D1795:47a-26: dri med ni rnam par rgyu ba'i rlung ngo //
T02D1795:47a-27: glang chen phrug ces bya ba ni zla gter gyi
T02D1795:47a-28: rtsal brten nas glang chen phrug gu ltar dri'i yul
T02D1795:47a-29: la 'dun pa dang bcas pa'i phyir glang chen phru
T02D1795:47a-30: gu ni yang dag par rgyu ba'i rlung ngo //
T02D1795:47a-31: nyi ma dang zhes bya ba ni mdzod ma'i rtsal
T02D1795:47a-32: brten nas ro'i yul nyi ma bzhin du gsal bar
T02D1795:47a-33: byed pas na / nyi ma ni rab tu rgyu ba'i rlung ngo //
T02D1795:47a-34: gsal byed dang zhes bya ba ni 'dod can ma'i rtsal brten nas /
T02D1795:47a-35: reg pa'i yul la gsal byed nyid kyi phyir gsal byed ni nges par rgyu ba'i rlung ngo //
T02D1795:47a-36: de ltar nyin par 'khor lo drug gi rim pas rlung rnams kyi ming bstan nas /
T02D1795:47a-37: mtshan mo yang de'i rim pas rgyu ba brjod pa'i phyir /
T02D1795:47a-38: nyi ma gnon zhes gsungs te /
T02D1795:47a-39: sprul pa'i 'khor lo gnas pa'i yang dag shugs kyi
T02D1795:47a-40: rtsal brten nas nyi ma ltar gnon pa ni rnam
T02D1795:47a-41: par gnon pas 'gro ba'i ngang tshul gang la yod
T02D1795:47a-42: pa de ni nyi ma gnon te /
T02D1795:47a-44: stobs ster zhes bya ba ni shin tu shugs kyi
T02D1795:47a-45: rtsal brten nas rlung dang bshang gci stobs byed pa
T02D1795:47a-46: rnams 'og tu byed pa'i phyir stobs ster ni thur
T02D1795:47a-48: nga ro dang ni zhes bya ba ni shin tu
T02D1795:47b-0: rtsal brten nas nga ro ltar @47b bza' ba la
T02D1795:47b-1: sogs pa rnams mnyam par byed pas nga ro ltar
T02D1795:47b-2: ni mnyam gnas kyi rlung ngo //
T02D1795:47b-3: dus zhes bya ba ni bzang por 'gro ba'i rtsal brten nas dus ni dus te /
T02D1795:47b-5: dus ni gyen du rgyu ba'i rlung ngo //
T02D1795:47b-6: sdom pa dang ni zhes bya ba ni sdom chen
T02D1795:47b-7: gyi rtsal brten nas gzugs kyi yul la sdom pa'i
T02D1795:47b-8: phyir sdom pa ni gyen du rgyu ba'i rlung ngo
T02D1795:47b-9: // mchongs nas 'gro ba zhes bya ba ni mi
T02D1795:47b-10: bzod che'i rtsal brten nas sgra'i yul la mchongs nas
T02D1795:47b-11: 'gro ba ltar byed pas mchongs nas 'gro ba ni
T02D1795:47b-12: rnam par rgyu ba'i rlung ngo //
T02D1795:47b-13: sbrang ma zhes bya ba ni mdzes chen ma'i rtsal
T02D1795:47b-14: brten nas dri'i yul la sprang ma ltar byang bas
T02D1795:47b-15: na sprang ma ni yang dag par rgyu ba'i rlung
T02D1795:47b-16: ngo // bskyod pa zhes bya ba ni mdun du skyes pa che'i rtsal brten nas /
T02D1795:47b-17: ro'i yul la rgyu zhing 'gro bas na bskyod ma ni rab tu rgyu ba'i rlung ngo //
T02D1795:47b-18: 'phyan pa zhes bya ba ni rgyags pa'i rtags kyi
T02D1795:47b-19: rtsal brten nas reg bya'i yul la khyi bzhin du
T02D1795:47b-20: myur bar 'gro bas na 'phyan pa ste nges par
T02D1795:47b-22: chos kyi 'khor lo la dgongs nas /
T02D1795:47b-23: bsil dang zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02D1795:47b-24: chos kyi 'khor lo'i dbus kyi ze'u 'brul bsil ba'i
T02D1795:47b-25: srog gi rlung 'jug par byed pas bsil ba ni
T02D1795:47b-27: sgur po zhes bya ba ni rin chen cod pan
T02D1795:47b-28: gyi rtsal brten nas 'og tu rgyu ba'i dang tshul
T02D1795:47b-29: gang la yod pa ste sgur po'i rtsa ni thur
T02D1795:47b-31: drang po dang zhes bya ba ni padma che'i rtsal brten nas /
T02D1795:47b-32: bza' ba dang bcas pa la sogs pa drang por
T02D1795:47b-33: mnyam par byed pas na drang po ni mnyam gnas
T02D1795:47b-34: kyi rlung ngo // sa dang zhes bya ba ni
T02D1795:47b-35: rdo rje chen po'i rtsal brten nas rang bzhin du
T02D1795:47b-36: gyen du rgyu bar byed pas nas ni gyen du
T02D1795:47b-38: sa la 'gro ba zhes bya ba ni stobs po
T02D1795:47b-39: che'i rtsal brten nas gzugs kyi yul 'gro bas na
T02D1795:47b-40: / sa la 'gro ba ni gyen du rgyu ba'i rlung ngo //
T02D1795:47b-41: bram ze dang zhes bya ba ni mgo bo chen
T02D1795:47b-42: po'i rtsal brten nas bram ze ltar sgra'i yul la
T02D1795:47b-43: 'gro bas na / bram ze ni rnam par rgyu ba'i rlung ngo //
T02D1795:47b-44: rnam 'gyur gnas zhes bya ba ni sgra chen po'i
T02D1795:47b-45: rtsal brten nas dri'i yul la gnas pa'i phyir rnam
T02D1795:47b-46: 'gyur gnas ni yang dag par rgyu ba'i rlung ngo
T02D1795:47b-47: // ma mo'i rigs dang zhes bya ba ni dga'
T02D1795:47b-48: ba chen po'i rtsal brten nas ma mo'i rigs ni
T02D1795:48a-1: bskyod pa zhes bya ba ni myos pa che'i rtsal
T02D1795:48a-2: brten nas reg bya'i yul la shin tu yang bskyod
T02D1795:48a-3: par byed pa'i phyir lce bskyod ma ni nges par
T02D1795:48a-5: me'i 'khor lo la ltos nas nges par brjod par bya ste /
T02D1795:48a-6: mi smra ba dang zhes bya ba ni me'i 'khor
T02D1795:48a-7: lo'i dbus la brten nas shin tu phra ba nyid
T02D1795:48a-8: kyis srog gi rlung 'jug pa'i phyir mi smra ba
T02D1795:48a-10: rnga sgra'i sprin zhes bya ba ni dri ma med
T02D1795:48a-11: pa'i rtsal brten nas sprin gyi sgra ltar thur sel
T02D1795:48a-12: gyi rlung 'jug pas na rnga sgra'i sprin ni thur
T02D1795:48a-14: dga' bar byed dang zhes bya ba ni gsal ba'i
T02D1795:48a-15: rtsal brten nas bza' ba dang bca' ba la sogs
T02D1795:48a-16: pa mnyam par byed pas lus la dga' bar byed

T02D1795:48a-25: ba nyid kyis dri ma med pa ni gyen du

T02D1795:48a-28: nas sgra'i yul la 'od srungs ni rnam par rgyu
T02D1795:48a-29: ba'i rlung ngo // ne tso zhes bya ba ni gang ba'i rtsal brten nas /

T02D1795:48a-39: longs spyod kyi 'khor lo la ltos nas brjod par bya ste ;
T02D1795:48a-40: mdzes dang zhes bya ba ni longs spyod kyi 'khor

T02D1795:48a-42: pa nyid kyi phyir mdzes pa'i rlung bzhin du srog
T02D1795:48a-44: chos kyi srog shing zhes bya ba ni longs spyod kyi rtsal brten nas /

T02D1795:48b-9: pa'i rtsal brten nas steng du 'jug pa la snying
T02D1795:48b-10: stobs ldan pa'i phyir snying stobs gyen du 'gro ba'i

T02D1795:48b-15: bong bu zhes bya ba ni skal ba'i rtsal brten

T02D1795:48b-19: ro'i yul la snyom las nyid kyi phyir snyom las ni rab tu 'bab pa'i rlung ngo //

T02D1795:48b-23: rlung gi 'khor lo la ltos nas brjod par bya ste /
T02D1795:48b-24: sgra chen zhes bya ba ni rlung gi 'khor lo'i
T02D1795:48b-25: lte ba la sgra chen po'i ngo bos 'jug pas
T02D1795:48b-26: na sgra chen po ni srog gi rlung ngo //
T02D1795:48b-27: rtsod pa can zhes bya ba ni rlung chen po'i rtsal brten nas /

T02D1795:48b-29: pa'i phyir rtsod pa can ni thur sel gyi rlung

T02D1795:48b-39: par du rtsal che ba'i phyir rtsal po che ni

T02D1795:49a-0: pa'i rtsal brten nas rtag tu sgra'i yul @49a *
T02D1795:49a-1: // la dga' ba ni rnam par rgyu pa'o //

T02D1795:49a-18: bde mchog ces bya ba ni 'dod pa can gyi rtsal brten nas mgo bo nas brtsams te /
T02D1795:49a-19: lus thams cad kyi tshigs kyi mthar thug pa byang
T02D1795:49a-20: chub kyis sems kyi sgo nas lus las sems ni

T02D1795:49a-29: brten nas gzugs kyi yul le 'dzin pas gzhan du

T02D1795:49a-33: zhes bya ba ni zla ba btung pa'i rtsal brten

T02D1795:49a-35: du shin tu dga' bas 'jug pa'i phyir /
T02D1795:49a-36: dra ba can ni padma bskor ba ni rnam par rgyu ngo //

T02D1795:49a-43: 'dun pa dang bcas pa'i phyir rma bya ni rab tu rgyu ba'i rlung ngo //
T02D1795:49b-0: rlung dang ni zhes bya ba ni @49b 'dod can
T02D1795:49b-1: ma'i rtsal brten nas 'dod chags kyi gdung ba bsil
T02D1795:49b-2: par byed pa'i phyir rlung ni nges par rgyu ba'i
T02D1795:49b-3: rlung ngo // de ltar ming rnams zhes bya ba
T02D1795:49b-4: ni rlung rnams kyi 'khor lo'i grangs kyis nyin mtshan
T02D1795:49b-5: gcig la brgya rtsa brgyad kyi grangs kyi ming ni
T02D1795:49b-6: tha snyad du byas pa gsungs te /

T02D1795:49b-9: de ltar rlung rnams kyi ming bstan nas /
T02D1795:49b-10: da ni de rnams bskyed pa la rim pa rnam par gzhag pa brjod pa'i phyir /
T02D1795:49b-11: de'i yan lag bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba gdab pa ni /

T02D1795:49b-15: ji lta ba'i gnas zhes bya ba ni bskyed pa'i gnas rnams so //
T02D1795:49b-16: dbye ba zhes bya ba ni rgyas par ro //
T02D1795:49b-17: gang las zhes bya ba ni gang gi phyir gnas gang las so //
T02D1795:49b-19: de dag ces bya ba ni rlung rnams te /
T02D1795:49b-20: de ma thag tu bshad pa rnams so //
T02D1795:49b-21: bgyid pa lags zhes bya ba ni rgya cher grangs
T02D1795:49b-22: kyi dbye bas phye ba nyid de ltar de'i don

T02D1795:49b-25: don du bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung la 'jug pa

T02D1795:49b-30: kyi de kho na nyid mngon du byas pa'i phyir
T02D1795:49b-31: ro // tshig gnyis po 'dis bcom ldan 'das la
T02D1795:49b-32: spangs pa dang ye shes phun sum tshogs pa bstan
T02D1795:49b-33: ro // to // rlung gi zhes bya ba ni sngon du bstan pa rnams la'o //
T02D1795:49b-34: gnas kyi mtshan nyid ces bya ba ni gnas las skye ba'i mtshan nyid do //

T02D1795:49b-36: gnas kyi rang gi ngo bo brjod pa'i phyir 'khor lo drug la khyab pa'i zhes gsungs te /
T02D1795:49b-42: bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo rnams su'o //
T02D1795:49b-43: khyab pa'i rlung zhes bya ba ni gcig bu nyid srog gi rlung gi rang bzhin no //
T02D1795:49b-44: chos kyi 'khor lo zhes bya ba ni snying ga'i
T02D1795:49b-45: gnas su rnam par shes pa dang lhan cig go

T02D1795:49b-48: de'i phyir srog ces bya ba gsungs te /
T02D1795:49b-49: ji skad du 'chad par 'gyur ba las /

T02D1795:50a-0: @50a * // dbang po'i sgo yi lam nas ni //
T02D1795:50a-1: dus rtag tu ni rab tu 'gro //
T02D1795:50a-2: 'dir ni srog ces bya bar brjod //
T02D1795:50a-5: de phyir 'gro ba khyab ces gsungs te /
T02D1795:50a-6: 'gro ba ni g-yo ba'i bdag nyid can gyi lus la'o //
T02D1795:50a-7: las kyi stobs kyis de dang der skye ba'i gnas te /
T02D1795:50a-8: skye ba len pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1795:50a-9: rnam rtog med par zhes bya ba ni rang bzhin gyis bems po'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1795:50a-10: thun phyed na zhes bya ba ni thun phyed kyi bdag nyid can te /
T02D1795:50a-11: chu tshod bzhi'i bdag nyid can gyi phyir ro //
T02D1795:50a-12: shar nas zhes bya ba ni skye bar 'gyur ba'o //
T02D1795:50a-13: nam mkha' mchog las zhes bya ba ni lte ba'i dbus las so //
T02D1795:50a-14: yang na 'khor ba thog ma med pa med pa

T02D1795:50a-16: sems kyi rgyun gyi stobs kyis skye ba'i phyir ro

T02D1795:50a-18: rlung ni 'joms par byed ces bya ba ni rlung
T02D1795:50a-19: gzhan yongs su spangs nas gnas pa nyid kyi phyir

T02D1795:50a-21: dgu'i rnam par rgyu zhes bya ba ni de nyid lte ba nas 'byung ba'i srog ni rlung ngo //

T02D1795:50a-23: khyab byed kyi rlung de nyid kyi nang du 'dus pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1795:50a-24: rlung de zhes bya ba ni sngon du bshad pa'i mtshan nyid can no //
T02D1795:50a-25: chos kyi 'khor lo rtsa'i dbye bas rnam pa dgu'o //
T02D1795:50a-27: thun phyed dus nas brtsams nas ni //
T02D1795:50a-29: bstan bcos las grags pa'i chu tshod bzhi'i mthar thug par zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1795:50a-30: 'jig rten pa la ltos nas thun ni dbyu gu brgyad kyi bdag nyid can no //
T02D1795:50a-31: 'khor lo drug las zhes bya ba ni khyab byed
T02D1795:50a-32: kyi rlung spangs nas dgu dgu'i grangs kyi ngo bos
T02D1795:50a-33: nyin mo la 'khor lo drug la lnga bcu rtsa
T02D1795:50a-34: bzhir 'gyur ro // mtshan mo la yang de nyid de brgya rtsa brgyad du 'gyur ro //
T02D1795:50a-35: dgu bdag nyid can zhes bya ba ni dgu dgu'i bdag nyid can ngo //
T02D1795:50a-36: thun phyed kyi mtha' nyid du zhes bya ba ni dbyu gu bzhi'i mthar thug pa'o //
T02D1795:50a-37: rlung rnams kyang ni ldang bar byed //

T02D1795:50b-2: de nyid gnas kyi dbye ba yis //

T02D1795:50b-5: gnas kyi dbye ba yis zhes bya ba ni yul
T02D1795:50b-6: rnams 'dzin pa la mngon du phyogs pa'i mtshan nyid
T02D1795:50b-7: kyis so // sna tshogs pa'i rtog par 'gro zhes
T02D1795:50b-8: bya ba ni yongs su ma shes pa'i gnas skabs
T02D1795:50b-9: kyis so // na / rang bzhin gyi ngo bo nyid kyis nyon mongs pa'i grangs su 'gyur ba'o //
T02D1795:50b-10: de ltar rnam pa gsum gyi rang gi ngo bo bstan nas /
T02D1795:50b-11: rang bzhin rnams kyi ming brjod pa'i phyir /
T02D1795:50b-12: de dag ming rnams bshad par bya //

T02D1795:50b-15: phye nas zhes bya ba ni rnam pa gsum gyi dbye bas rgyas par ro //
T02D1795:50b-16: ming rnams ni tha snyad du gyur pa ste /
T02D1795:50b-17: bshad par bya ba zhes dam bca' ba'o //

T02D1795:50b-22: byams pa med pa'i sems ni zhe sdang ngo //

T02D1795:50b-24: rang bzhin shes pa dang bral ba nyid kyi sems
T02D1795:50b-26: rgyags pa dang zhes bya ba ni sems la yul mthong bas mtho ba'i ngo bo ni rgyags pa'o //
T02D1795:50b-27: nga rgyal zhes bya ba ni rtog pa khyad par
T02D1795:50b-28: can ma thob pa la bdag gis thob po snyam
T02D1795:50b-30: mngon par zhen pa zhes bya ba ni khyad par
T02D1795:50b-31: du 'phags pa'i dngos po bdag gis ji ltar thob

T02D1795:50b-41: chos so // nyam nga ba zhes bya ba ni

T02D1795:51a-0: @51a * // blo rgod pa zhes bya ba ni sems dmigs pa la spro ba med pa'o //
T02D1795:51a-1: brkam chags nyid dang ni zhes bya ba ni sems

T02D1795:51a-3: // gnyid ces bya ba ni gnyid do //
